pr_title: Match all Exception types in KillIntegrationTest to fix flakiness

timeline.bodyText:
This handles the following case:

  
    
      crate/libs/dex/src/test/java/io/crate/testing/FailingBatchIterator.java
    
    
         Line 46
      in
      6814214
    
    
    
    

        
          
           Exceptions.rethrowUnchecked(new InterruptedException("Job killed")); 
        
    
  


The test used to match against SqlActionException which wrapped all underlying exceptions. Now since SqlActionException is gone we need to match each exception type.
timeline.author: mkleen
